New Records: India scored 196 for five, the highest total at this venue so far
Bangladesh ended up with 146/8 in 20 overs
Key Match Events: Litton Das was dismissed after a premeditated walk across the stumps
Kuldeep Yadav foxed Bangladesh batters with his guile
Hardik Pandya produced an all-round show
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh started with spinners from both ends against the two right-handers
Skipper Rohit Sharma (23 off 11) was happy to lose the toss
Post-Match Reflections: India will meet their match in Australia, the two unbeaten teams so far
Kuldeep (3/19) made the Bangladesh batters look clueless
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a dominant 50-run victory for India
The highest total at this venue so far was 196 for five by India
